items.summary: The goal of lean startups is to iterate through the cycle of building and learning as quickly as possible.

items.summary: A thin end-to-end implementation of functionality.

items.title: 4-Panel storyboard
items.summary: A tightly constrained visual narrative of an app's value, from persona, context, and problem through payoff and conclusion.

items.name: ui-sketch

items.summary: A rough diagram of an interface or interface flow

items.name: task-scenario
items.summary: A situation to put test users into.

items.name: spike
items.summary: A time-boxed coding task to better understand a specific technical requirement

items.summary: Team works together on a single user story.

items.name: user-testing
items.summary: User test to detect flaws in product hypotheses

items.name: velocity
items.summary: How many story points were completed in the previous iteration.

items.summary: Velocity math predicts project completion based on measured velocity.

items.name: gantt-math
items.summary: Gantt math predicts project completion based on slippage on the critical path.

items.name: health-charts
items.summary: Informal visual displays of team mood.

items.summary: An analysis of the causal forces leading to recurring issues in development.
